item.title: 2CO 12
item.description: 2CO 12:2 This verse confirms that there is more than one heaven Related verses: 2 Chronicles 2:6, 2 Corinthians 12:2. See notes

item.title: 2CO 4
item.description: 2CO 4:4 Solomon prayed for an understanding mind and a hearing (obedient heart). Understanding is really important in administer justice as the King and representatives of God. I as a Christian represent the Lord Jesus and need understanding to obey the words of God. Unless God opens my mind, I may never understand many things that I have been taught. Since my mind needs to be renewed by the word of God, it becomes easier when I pray for God to give me an understanding mind and an obedient heart.

item.title: 2CO 3
item.description: 2CO 3:14 the veil of unbelief is removed when we are in Christ Related verses: 2 CORINTHIANS 3:14. See notes 2CO 3:14 People cannot understand the truth let alone believe it because their minds had been blinded by a veil caused by Satan. The veil can only be removed when we believe in Jesus. This is why evangelists and preachers are needed Related verses: Romans 10:13-16, 2 Corinthians 3:14, 2 Corinthians 4:4.

item.title: 2CO 7
item.description: 2CO 7:9 Godly sorrow leads us to repentance for our own benefit. The sorrow this world gives leads to depression, anxiety and all sorts of pain and nothing will truly be able to satisfy or solve the problem unless we surrender them to God Related verses: 2 CORINTHIANS 7:9. See notes
